content: **knitted hipster-hat for men in drops alaska ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no x-458 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 57/59 - 59/62 cm **materials** drops alaska from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 37 dark blue needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
